text: See description in the referenced mail to user@ant

text:
I wasn't aware of that report, yes, seems to be the same problem.

The discussion in 36565 indicates that just quoting the entire argument wouln't
help.  We'll see once I've coded up an AntUnit test, I guess.

text: *** Bug 36565 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

text:

patch (only when forcing the tasks to use a response file) and pass now.
